h2_title: The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlan Shang
content:
When the battle with Erlang, the Sacred Divinity is over, you'll then need to take on The Four Heavenly Kings. The final part of this epic battle is to take on Erlang Shen. 

The Four Heavenly Kings
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", within the section "Secret Bosses in Chapter 6" and the sub-section "The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlan Shang". The content is presented below:

When the battle with Erlang, the Sacred Divinity is over, you'll then need to take on The Four Heavenly Kings. The final part of this epic battle is to take on Erlang Shen. 

The Four Heavenly Kings
